text:
Hi Guys,

Hope you are doing well.

I am writing this to get help in achieving the following goal,

Can we create a CMS Quote Theme from scratch and use it just like we have a default CMS Quote Theme? (Screenshot attached)

I need to create a quote template that is far different from the 3 default templates provided by HubSpot.

Please suggest.

Thanks,
You can Clone the Default Quote Theme and make your changes
